title: Matteo Jorgenson Stymied By French Tactics in Top-10 Olympic Brawl: ‘They Were Not Racing For the Win’
content:
The Idahoan was one of the strongest in the race and leaves Paris with a bittersweet 9th: 'I had the best feeling I ever had in a one-day race, I wish I would have used it to medal.'

Read the full article at Matteo Jorgenson Stymied By French Tactics in Top-10 Olympic Brawl: ‘They Were Not Racing For the Win’ on Velo.
author: ahood
